text.div:
This code system http://example.org/fhir/fish/CodeSystem/HIVExtendedCodes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
First-time First-time user of ARTClient is ART naive, having never taken ART to treat HIV before
Restarting Restarting ARTClient is restarting ART after stopping treatment for any reason

name: HIVExtendedCodes
title: HIV Extended Codes
description: Codes defined only in this Implementation Guide and require mapping to a standard semantic terminology.

concept.definition: Client is ART naive, having never taken ART to treat HIV before
Client is restarting ART after stopping treatment for any reason
